headline: AmEx Expands Its Sports Play: Can Miami Be the Game-Changer?
summary: AXP deepens its sports push with Miami deals, eyeing growth through exclusive perks and global Formula 1 expansion.

headline: American Express (AXP) Expands Exclusive Perks With New Hard Rock Stadium Partnership
summary: American Express (AXP) has recently been announced as the Official Payments Partner for Hard Rock Stadium, the FORMULA 1® CRYPTO.COM MIAMI GRAND PRIX, and the Miami Dolphins, a multi-year partnership that enhances card member experiences. This exciting development, alongside partnerships with AEG and Toast that expand global benefits in entertainment and dining, aligns with the company's 7% price increase last quarter. This performance contrasts the broader market, which faced challenges with...
